General.Name: Arcelormittal South
General.Description: ArcelorMittal South Africa Limited manufactures and sells steel products. It operates through Steel Operations, Non-Steel Operations, and Other segments. The company offers hot rolled, uncoated, and coated coils; merchant bars; wire rods; and seamless. It also engages in the non-steel operations consisting of coke and chemicals; and produces and markets commercial grade coal. The company was formerly known as Mittal Steel South Africa Limited and changed its name to ArcelorMittal South Africa Limited in October 2006. The company was founded in 1928 and is headquartered in Vanderbijlpark, South Africa. ArcelorMittal South Africa Limited is a subsidiary of Arcelormittal Holdings Ag.
